name: Chronicles of arrugeine 15: colors dream in internal sleep
name_original: Chronicles of arrugeine 15: colors dream in internal sleep
description: After countless battles with the evil crab, Killian Deathmaster 3000, you have trapped him in the skateboard loop to defeat him once and for all, chase him around the skatepark and shoot him with your magic bazooka, but avoid his magic orbs and your own ricocheting shots.
